Applying to the College of Medicine? Our four campuses, Chicago, Peoria, Urbana and Rockford share one central admissions office , located in Chicago. Interviewing at the College of Medicine in Peoria? If the University of Illinois College of Medicine Office of Admissions has scheduled you to interview here in Peoria, click here to learn more about what to expect during your visit to our campus. Are you a recently admitted student? Congratulations! If you are considering which campus to request or if you have been assigned to the Peoria campus, we invite you to explore our website to learn more about our opportunities and programs. Hear what other students have to say about Peoria and see pictures of our area on YouTube. To schedule a visit to the Peoria campus, call 309-671-8411. To see a partial list of rental options, download our housing guide .
